tables.table_schema: Patients ( patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(255), medication_name VARCHAR(255), dosage_schedule VARCHAR(255) )

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender CHAR(1),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  prescription_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dosage FLOAT NOT NULL,
  schedule VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  date_prescribed DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);
CREATE TABLE PatientPrescriptions ( prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, patient_id UUID, medication_name VARCHAR, dosage VARCHAR, schedule VARCHAR );
CREATE TABLE MedicationInventory ( medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, medication_name VARCHAR, quantity INT, expiration_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE DoctorPrescriptions ( prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, doctor_id UUID, patient_id UUID, medication_id UUID, dosage VARCHAR, schedule VARCHAR );

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name STRING,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address STRING,
    phone_number STRING
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
    medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name STRING,
    dosage_amount FLOAT,
    dosage_frequency STRING,
    prescription_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    medication_id UUID REFERENCES medications(medication_id),
    dosage_schedule STRING,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medication_history (
  history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient_prescriptions(patient_id),
  medication_name STRING,
  dosage FLOAT,
  datetime TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE medication_schedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient_prescriptions(patient_id),
  medication_name STRING,
  dosage FLOAT,
  time_schedule TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patient_information (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name STRING,
  age INT,
  gender STRING,
  medical_condition STRING
);

CREATE TABLE doctor_prescriptions (
  prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient_information(patient_id),
  doctor_name STRING,
  prescription_details STRING,
  prescription_date TIMESTAMP
);
